name: Concentrated Flow Points
functionStatement: Quantity + quality of inflow (tributaries, ditches, and pipes) does not provide harmful peaks or pollution, and supports diverse habitat conditions.
descriptionMarkdown: Count of concentrated inflow locations (ditches, pipes, outfalls) that can deliver runoff, sediment, or pollutants to the reach.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel

Method: Field (with desktop pre-screen)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Walk the reach (or use imagery pre-screen) and count concentrated inflow points; normalize by reach length (e.g., per 1,000 ft or per 100 m).

inputs.label: Concentrated Flow Points
inputs.helpMarkdown: Field reconnaissance and/or municipal outfall/ditch GIS with imagery validation.

references: Municipal MS4/NPDES outfall layers where available
